title: Perma Banned after 1 game while being the victim.

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
I was playing yi and my team flamed me for not ganking. So I just went bot lane and split pushed majority of the game. and I get Perma'd hehexd



Game 1 
丨白容Byron: why 
丨白容Byron: gg top 
丨白容Byron: surrender im just gonna afk bot 
丨白容Byron: dam that was really smart 
丨白容Byron: nice try guys 
丨白容Byron: gg nice try team!!

replies.body:
Judging from your match history, this is the first game after a 14-day ban (excluding the remake game).

Telling your team that you're going to afk is not exactly the best thing to do on the first game you get back. You're on extremely thin ice when you get back from a 14-day ban.
Especially since he literally did AFK farm for the remainder of the game.

Well yeah. AFK farming is against the rules, and you blatantly admitted that that's what you were doing. And if I'm reading your match history correctly, you had been off your 14-day ban for less than a day when you did this.

You were clearly trolling, so I don't know what the fuck this thread is supposed to accomplish.
Friendly reminder that chat logs do not display champion select or post game chat but those chats are taken into account with your ban.

wouldnt matter I have no reason to type in champ select. and if I were to be in a state to where I would want to type in postgame It would most likely be because I lost the game, but instantly re queue

> So I just went bot lane and split pushed 

> 丨白容Byron: surrender im just gonna afk bot

These the statements are conflicting.

I'm going to guess you did as you said in chat, and got punished for that.
Were you recently banned before hand...also, how is flaming your allies make you the victim again?

getting blamed for not ganking or making a bad play. while i was 2/0/3 and we had a team fight, but I was being at fault according to my team, Not the 1/5 arcane comet top lane kled that joined the game late. hmmmmm. 5 words vs the rest of my team which I cant get a hold of. Id say I would be the victim.
Until you fire back. Then you're no longer a victim.

Alright there's the slight negativity/unsportsmanship that got you sent straight to the gallows, "gg top and surrender I'm just gonna afk bot" they prob saw you stay there x10 speed in 5 secs so rip.

Anyway {{champion:11}} is a jungle 0 gank 45 min afk farm champ that proceeds to 1v5 if not cc/bursted, But the problem is, there's literally no late game anymore, it's already mid and late by 15 mins for those who snowball against those that feed, also the jungle camps don't even respawn fast enough so you are literally forced to gank when you're weak, with a chance to the tilt the odds of your laner of choice to gank into better odds.(cough bot since it revolves around them and not useless top unless they hypercarry/sup)
